title: Color
description: A color.  The color can optionally vary over time.

rgba.description: The color specified as an array of color components `[Red, Green, Blue, Alpha]` where each component is an integer in the range 0-255.

rgbaf.description: The color specified as an array of color components `[Red, Green, Blue, Alpha]` where each component is a double in the range 0.0-1.0.

reference.description: The color specified as a reference to another property.
